    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/794</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/794</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Mapes d'Europa</string>
            <string language="en">Maps of Europe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Karten von Europa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cartes de l'Europe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mapas de Europa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programmi di Europa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χάρτες της Ευρώπης</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Recurs didàctic interactiu que permet representar i imprimir dades diverses  (fronteres, relleu, rius, ciutats, infraestructures de comunicació) sobre mapes d'Europa, així com la creació de gràfics. Els mapes poden modificar la seva escala.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive resource that allows viewer to present and print different types of statistics (geographic, economic and demographic) on maps of Europe, and also to draw graphs. The map scale can be modified.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">aeroport</string>
            <string language="en">airport</string>
            <string language="es">aeropuerto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">cartografia</string>
            <string language="en">cartography</string>
            <string language="es">cartografía</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">desert</string>
            <string language="en">desert</string>
            <string language="es">desierto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">geografia</string>
            <string language="en">geography</string>
            <string language="es">geografía</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">medi geofísic</string>
            <string language="en">geophysical environment</string>
            <string language="es">medio geofísico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">muntanya</string>
            <string language="en">mountain</string>
            <string language="es">montaña</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">oceà</string>
            <string language="en">ocean</string>
            <string language="es">océano</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">port</string>
            <string language="en">port</string>
            <string language="es">puerto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">ferrocarril</string>
            <string language="en">railway</string>
            <string language="es">ferrocarril</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">carreteres</string>
            <string language="en">roads</string>
            <string language="es">carreteras</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktives Hilfsmittel, das Projektor erlaubt, 
unterschiedliche Typen der Statistiken (geographisch, ökonomisch und 
demographisch) auf Karten von Europa darzustellen und zu drucken und 
auch zu den Betragdiagrammen. Die Karte Skala kann geändert 
werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressource interactive qui permet au visualisateur
de présenter et imprimer différents types de statistiques 
(géographique, économique et démographique) sur des cartes de 
l'Europe, et également aux graphiques d'aspiration. L'échelle 
de carte peut être modifiée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recurso interativo que permite que o visor 
apresente e imprima tipos diferentes de statistics (geográfico, 
econômico e demográfico) em mapas de Europa, e também aos gráficos
da tração. A escala do mapa pode ser modificada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risorsa interattiva che permette che il visore 
presenti e stampi i tipi differenti di statistiche (geografico, 
economico e demografico) sui programmi di Europa ed anche ai grafici 
di tiraggio. La scala del programma può essere modificata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογικό στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς που επιτρέπει στην 
εμφάνιση για να παρουσιάσει και να τυπώσει τους διαφορετικούς 
τύπους στατιστικών (γεωγραφικός, οικονομικός και δημογραφικός) 
στους χάρτες της Ευρώπης, και επίσης για να σύρει τις γραφικές 
παραστάσεις. Η κλίμακα χαρτών μπορεί να τροποποιηθεί.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Flughafen</string>
          </keyword>
